Simon Cowell for Glee character The 50-year-old actress- who plays scathing cheerleading coach Sue Sylvester on the US TV show- believes there are many similarities between the teacher and the straight-talking talent show judge. "He's a great inspiration for the character of Sue- there is a lot that I can take from him and put into her.
